summary.summary: Multiple authentication attempts detected, likely a brute-force attack.

logs.original_log: sshd: authentication failed | IndexTime: 2025-09-21T03:24:19.871Z | LogTime: Sep 21 03:24:19 | SrcIP=192.168.1.225
logs.hypothesis: An attacker is attempting to brute-force SSH credentials.
logs.investigation_log: The log indicates multiple authentication attempts failed. The MITRE IDs suggest a brute-force attack.
recommendations: Monitor SSH logs for further attempts
Implement rate limiting for SSH connections

logs.original_log: PAM: User login failed. | IndexTime: 2025-09-21T03:37:27.964Z | LogTime: Sep 21 03:37:26 | SrcIP=192.168.2.25
logs.hypothesis: An attacker is attempting to brute-force PAM credentials.
logs.investigation_log: The log indicates a user login failed. The MITRE ID suggests a brute-force attack.
recommendations: Monitor PAM logs for further attempts
Implement rate limiting for PAM connections

logs.original_log: unix_chkpwd: Password check failed. | IndexTime: 2025-09-21T03:37:27.964Z | LogTime: Sep 21 03:37:26 | SrcIP=192.168.2.25
logs.hypothesis: An attacker is attempting to brute-force Unix password checks.
logs.investigation_log: The log indicates repeated Unix password check failures. This strongly suggests brute-force attempts.

logs.original_log: sshd: multiple failed logins | IndexTime: 2025-09-21T03:50:10.124Z | LogTime: Sep 21 03:50:09 | SrcIP=192.168.3.15
logs.hypothesis: An attacker is conducting repeated SSH brute-force attempts.
logs.investigation_log: The log shows multiple failed SSH logins from a single source IP, matching brute-force patterns.
recommendations: Enable intrusion detection alerts for SSH brute-force
